summary: This is a criminal history record (rap sheet) produced by the FBI and New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services in response to a request for information from the State of Florida. It appears to be a delayed response providing additional sentencing information for an individual, though the subject's name is not visible in the provided text.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: Listed as the executive deputy commissioner of the agency providing the criminal history record information.

events.title: Criminal History Record Production
events.description: A criminal history record (rap sheet) was produced by the FBI and NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services in response to a request from the State of Florida for additional sentencing information.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St., Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: This document is a criminal history record (rap sheet) produced on October 6, 2021.
The record was generated in response to a request from the State of Florida for additional sentencing information about an individual.
The subject of the rap sheet is not named in the provided text excerpts.
The document includes standard criminal history sections: identification, criminal history with arrest/charge/disposition details, and an index of agencies.
The record is described as a 'multi-source offender record' and comes with caveats about its use and the need to contact contributing agencies for explanations.
